description.narrative: This activity (Strengthening Citizen Engagement in Mozambique) is a component of Strengthening Citizen Engagement in Mozambique reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £6,437,234. This component benefits Mozambique, and works in the following sector(s): Democratic participation and civil society. , with the following implementing partners: Crown Agents Bank, Crown Agents Limited. The start date is 01-02-2012 and the end date is 31-12-2017.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA
